medical_history.chief_complaint: A 45-year-old Caucasian female presented with a history of constipation, easy fatigue, depressive mood, lassitude, polydipsia, and polyuria.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The symptoms have been present for 10 years, characterized by easy fatigue, lassitude, polydipsia, and polyuria. The patient reported a history of constipation as well. The patient was referred after unsuccessful treatment of hypercalcemia with loop diuretics.
medical_history.past_medical_history: The patient had previously been treated for gastric ulcer.
